Welcome to Telesocial Java SDK website. Telesocial Java SDK let's you create applications that make use of Telesocial API.

What you can do with Telesocial API

Telesocial converts the User IDs into phone numbers with the Social Enum� and transmits the calls to the right networks. You can allow your app's users to use a social network id of a friend as a phone number.

Using the Telesocial Java SDK

You can simply drop latest version of telesocial-rest-api jar, and it's dependencies, in your classpath and start using telesocial's features with a few simple lines of code. The jar is also available via SonaType's maven repository.

Sample Project

We have created a simple web application that demonstrates most of the current features of Telesocial API. You can just grab the war file, deploy it in your favorite container and start playing with it. You'll need a API key from http://telesocial.com/developers.html
